credit_line: Bequest of Harry A. Sellery, Class of 1932
title: Akasaka (from the series "Sixty-nine Stations of the Kisokaido (Kisokaido rokujuku tsugi no uchi))
inscriptions: Publisher's seal in lower right; recto: u.l., u.r., l.r. in ink: [calligraphic characters]; verso:on frame backing l. center typed Akasaka on the Kisokaido/By Ando Hiroshige 1797-1858; stamped on label: ORIGINAL-GUARANTEED
